nodes.text: The Galactic Podracing Circuit Underwriters' Union was a collection of insurance agencies that provided backing to the various podracing arenas and leagues that were operating during the final years of the Galactic Republic. The union insured racers and support crews, as well as the arena operators for all manner of possible issues.
During the Separatist Crisis which plagued the Galactic Senate, the Union issued a bounty on Jord Stokk; a bounty which was filled by Jango Fett.
